attributes.action: Vehicle fog lights to automatically switch off after five minutess
attributes.additional_details:
Despite clear guidance in the Highway Code, drivers in the UK often seem unable to use their fog lights correctly. Rear fog lights are a hazzard and a distraction to following vehicles unless there is very poor visibility from snow, rain or dense fog.
The department of transport should legislate that car manufacturers install fog light switches that automatically switch off the rear fog lights after five minutes, forcing the driver to re-evaluate the need for their use and avoiding them simply being left on in error.
